EmailTemplate.description: This template should ONLY be used to respond back to an external Customer. This template should be used if the Customer requested to escalate their out of policy Push-Out request to the Customer Business Team (CBT) and the CBT has failed to respond within 7 calendar days of escalation to the CBT.
EmailTemplate.name: Order Schd Line Push-Out Request-Out-of-policy Final Response to EXTERNAL Cust
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Schedule Line Push-Out Request {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
